title: No cesspools shall be allowed to be constructed unless there exists an agency for clearing them regularly and properly
clause_text: No cesspools shall be allowed to be constructed unless there exists an agency for clearing them regularly and properly. No cesspool shall be used or made within 100 feet of any well. No Khalkuwa Khalketi shall be used for reception of night soil.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: No cesspools shall be allowed to be constructed unless there exists an agency for clearing them regularly and properly.
